First strike
[i]Avoid[/i] – Whenever Lon'Qu attacks, target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Lon'Qu attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Partner with Gaius, Confectionery Pilferer
